alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, NORTHWESTERN BROWN, SOUTHEASTERN WARREN, SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON AND NORTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Williamsburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Hillsboro, Blanchester, Williamsburg, Lynchburg, New Vienna, Russell, Woodville, Owensville, Martinsville, Newtonsville, Fayetteville, Midland, St. Martin, Chasetown, Westboro, Cuba, Morrisville, Edenton and Burtonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
